title: Gauntlet-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS:
  

                       Gauntlet (c) Arrowhead Game Studios
   
     Release Date :  9/2014                         Protection : Steam
     Discs        :  1                    Genre      : Action
   
   
     
   
     The classic Gauntlet 4-player co-op action gameplay returns in a
     completely new experience! Battle the endless hordes of foes as you
     and your friends fight for treasure and glory via both local and
     online co-op multiplayer. Invade the Darkness this Summer on PC and
     Steam Machines!
   
   
      
   
    - Extract
    - Burn or mount the .iso
    - Run setup.exe and install
    - copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
    - Play
   
    Notes: To start the game you must use the shortcut on your desktop
   
    Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
    online ..
